name: Wordchuck
tag_list: translation, ruby-on-rails, content-management, internationalization, localization, i18n
overview:
Wordchuck is a translation service for web content.

We allow you to organize and manage content for your web projects, submit content to human translators, and automatically deploy the latest translations.

  • Use our professional translators or invite your own.
  • Non-technical team members can make and deploy wording changes without pulling developers away from coding.
  • No more tedious copy-paste-repeat deployment - we do all the heavy lifting!

Our initial release is tailored for the Ruby on Rails community, with an API, Ruby Gem and demo apps in Rails 2.x and Rails 3.
